span.span: Encapsulates a Windows Presentation Foundation application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个类，用于封装[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]特定于应用程序的功能，包括以下： is a class that encapsulates [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] application-specific functionality, including the following: - **应用程序生命周期**: ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， 。**Application Lifetime**: , , , , , , , , , . - **应用程序作用域窗口、 属性和资源管理**: ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， 。**Application-Scope Window, Property, and Resource Management**: , , , , , , , , . - **命令行参数和退出代码处理**: ， ， 。**Command-Line Parameter and Exit Code Processing**: , , . - **导航**: ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， 。**Navigation**: , , , , , , , , . 实现以提供对其窗口、 属性和资源范围内服务的共享的访问的单一实例模式。 implements the singleton pattern to provide shared access to its window, property, and resource scope services. 因此，只有一个实例的类可以创建每个。Consequently, only one instance of the class can be created per . 您可以实现使用标记、 标记和代码隐藏中或代码。You can implement an using markup, markup and code-behind, or code. 如果是否标记文件中的标记或标记和代码隐藏，必须配置为使用标记，实现[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_msbuild](~/includes/tlasharptla-msbuild-md.md)]`ApplicationDefinition`项。If is implemented with markup, whether markup or markup and code-behind, the markup file must be configured as an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_msbuild](~/includes/tlasharptla-msbuild-md.md)] `ApplicationDefinition` item. > [!NOTE] > 独立应用程序不需要对象; 就可以实现一个自定义`static`入口点方法 (`Main`)，而无需创建的实例将打开一个窗口。A standalone application does not require an object; it is possible to implement a custom `static` entry point method (`Main`) that opens a window without creating an instance of . 但是，[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)]需要对象。However, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)] require an object. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何对标准应用程序是使用仅标记来定义：The following example shows how a standard application is defined using only markup: [!code-xaml[ApplicationSnippets#ApplicationMARKUP](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationSnippets/CSharp/AppMarkup.xaml#applicationmarkup)] 下面的示例演示如何使用定义的标准应用程序只代码：The following example shows how a standard application is defined using only code: [!code-csharp[ApplicationSnippets#ApplicationCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationSnippets/CSharp/AppCode.cs#applicationcode)] [!code-vb[ApplicationSnippets#ApplicationCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationSnippets/visualbasic/appcode.vb#applicationcode)] 下面的示例演示如何对标准应用程序是使用标记和代码隐藏的组合来定义。The following example shows how a standard application is defined using a combination of markup and code-behind. [!code-xaml[ApplicationSnippets#ApplicationXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationSnippets/CSharp/App.xaml#applicationxaml)] [!code-csharp[ApplicationSnippets#ApplicationCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationSnippets/CSharp/App.xaml.cs#applicationcodebehind)] [!code-vb[ApplicationSnippets#ApplicationCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationSnippets/visualbasic/application.xaml.vb#applicationcodebehind)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有一个实例类可以创建每个，以确保对应用程序作用域窗口、 属性和资源数据的一组共享的访问。Only one instance of the class can be created per , to ensure shared access to a single set of application-scope window, property, and resource data. 因此的默认构造函数类检测正在初始化的实例是否为中的第一个实例; 如果不是，引发。Consequently, the default constructor of the class detects whether the instance being initialized is the first instance in an ; if it is not, an is thrown. 对象的当前公开从静态属性。The object for the current is exposed from the static property.

summary.span: Occurs when an application becomes the foreground application.

span.span: Occurs when an application becomes the foreground application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 具有一个或多个打开的窗口的 Windows Presentation Foundation 应用程序激活 （成为前台应用程序） 时的一个窗口以来激活时首次启动应用程序，或其中一个窗口激活时时应用程序处于非活动状态： 具体而言，执行了激活时：A Windows Presentation Foundation application that has one or more open windows is activated (becomes the foreground application) when one of the windows is activated for the first time since the application was launched, or when one of the windows is activated while the application is inactive: Specifically, activation occurs when: - 应用程序打开其第一个窗口。An application opens its first window. - 用户通过使用 ALT + TAB 或通过使用任务管理器切换到应用程序。A user switches to the application by using ALT+TAB or by using Task Manager. - 用户单击其中一个应用程序中窗口的任务栏按钮。A user clicks the taskbar button for one of the windows in an application. 需要在激活时进行检测的应用程序可以处理事件。Applications that need to detect when they activate can handle the event. 第一次激活应用程序后，它可能会停用并在其生存期中多次重新激活。After an application is first activated, it may be deactivated and reactivated many times during its lifetime. 如果应用程序的行为或状态取决于其激活状态，它可以处理上述两和的事件，以确定哪些的激活状态。If an application's behavior or state depends on its activation state, it can handle both and events to determine which activation state it's in. 一旦应用程序处于活动状态，将不会再次引发之前停用应用程序，而不考虑应用程序处于活动状态时激活应用程序中窗口的数量。Once an application becomes active, will not be raised again until the application is deactivated, irrespective of how many windows within an application are activated while the application is active. 不引发[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)]。 is not raised for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)]. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何检测时独立应用程序激活和停用。The following example shows how to detect when a standalone application activates and deactivates. [!code-xaml[ApplicationActivationSnippets#DetectActivationStateXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationActivationSnippets/CSharp/App.xaml#detectactivationstatexaml)] [!code-csharp[ApplicationActivationSnippets#DetectActivationStateCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationActivationSnippets/CSharp/App.xaml.cs#detectactivationstatecodebehind)] [!code-vb[ApplicationActivationSnippets#DetectActivationStateCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationActivationSnippets/visualbasic/application.xaml.vb#detectactivationstatecodebehind)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为每个-实现静态的单一实例类型属性以提供对共享访问权限当前实例。 is a per- singleton type that implements the static property to provide shared access to the instance for the current . 此设计可确保该状态由，其中包括共享的资源和状态、 从一个单一的共享位置。This design guarantees that state managed by , including shared resources and state, is available from a single, shared location. 此属性是线程安全的可从任何线程。This property is thread safe and is available from any thread.

summary.span: Occurs when an application stops being the foreground application.

span.span: Occurs when an application stops being the foreground application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 具有一个或多个打开的窗口的 Windows Presentation Foundation 应用程序会停用 （停止作为前台应用程序） 时，用户执行以下：A Windows Presentation Foundation application that has one or more open windows deactivates (stops being the foreground application) when a user does the following: - 切换到另一个应用程序通过使用 ALT + TAB 或通过使用任务管理器。Switches to another application by using ALT+TAB or by using Task Manager. - 单击另一个应用程序中的窗口的任务栏按钮。Clicks the taskbar button for a window in another application. 应用程序需要检测停用可以处理事件。Applications that need to detect deactivation can handle the event. 第一次激活应用程序后，它可能会停用并在其生存期中多次重新激活。After an application is first activated, it may be deactivated and reactivated many times during its lifetime. 如果应用程序的行为或状态取决于其激活状态，它可以处理上述两和的事件，以确定其状态。If an application's behavior or state depends on its activation state, it can handle both and events to determine which state it's in. 不引发[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)]。 is not raised for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)]. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何检测时独立应用程序停用和激活。The following example shows how to detect when a standalone application deactivates and activates. [!code-xaml[ApplicationActivationSnippets#DetectActivationStateXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationActivationSnippets/CSharp/App.xaml#detectactivationstatexaml)] [!code-csharp[ApplicationActivationSnippets#DetectActivationStateCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationActivationSnippets/CSharp/App.xaml.cs#detectactivationstatecodebehind)] [!code-vb[ApplicationActivationSnippets#DetectActivationStateCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationActivationSnippets/visualbasic/application.xaml.vb#detectactivationstatecodebehind)]

summary.span: Occurs when an exception is thrown by an application but not handled.

span.span: Occurs when an exception is thrown by an application but not handled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，Windows Presentation Foundation 捕获未经处理的异常、 通知用户 （用户可以从该对话框报告异常） 对话框中，从异常并自动关闭一个应用程序。By default, Windows Presentation Foundation catches unhandled exceptions, notifies users of the exception from a dialog box (from which they can report the exception), and automatically shuts down an application. 但是，如果应用程序需要从一个集中位置执行自定义的未处理的异常处置，则应处理。However, if an application needs to perform custom unhandled exception processing from a centralized location, you should handle . 引发的对于每个主 UI 线程上运行的代码中未经处理的异常。 is raised by an for each exception that is unhandled by code running on the main UI thread. 如果异常未处理在 UI 线程的背景 (具有其自己的线程) 或后台工作线程 (而无需线程)，该异常不会转发到主 UI 线程。If an exception is not handled on either a background UI thread (a thread with its own ) or a background worker thread (a thread without a ), the exception is not forwarded to the main UI thread. 因此，则不会引发。Consequently, is not raised. 在这些情况下，需要编写代码来执行以下操作：In these circumstances, you will need to write code to do the following: 1. 处理后台线程上的异常。Handle exceptions on the background thread. 2. 这些异常调度到主 UI 线程。Dispatch those exceptions to the main UI thread. 3. 再次引发这些异常在主 UI 线程上而不进行处理，以允许引发。Rethrow them on the main UI thread without handling them to allow to be raised. 有关详细信息，请参阅[线程模型](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/threading-model.md)概述。For more information, see the [Threading Model](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/threading-model.md) overview. 事件处理程序传递包含与异常有关的上下文信息的参数包括：The event handler is passed a argument that contains contextual information regarding the exception, including: - 异常 ()。The exception (). - 从它 ()。The from which it originated (). 可以使用此信息以确定异常是否为可恢复。You can use this information to determine whether an exception is recoverable or not. 可恢复的异常可能，例如，虽然可能不可恢复异常，例如。A recoverable exception might be a , for example, while an unrecoverable exception might be a , for example. 处理未经处理的异常时，并且您不想[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]若要继续处理它，您需要设置属性设置为`true`。When you process an unhandled exception from , and you don't want [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] to continue processing it, you need to set the property to `true`. 与其他事件不同，引发，不具有匹配受到保护虚拟实现 (OnDispatcherUnhandledException)。Unlike the other events that raises, does not have a matching protected virtual implementation (OnDispatcherUnhandledException). 因此，类的派生始终必须注册的事件处理程序来处理未经处理的异常。Consequently, classes that derive from must always register an event handler with to process unhandled exceptions. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何处理未经处理的异常处理事件。The following example shows how to process unhandled exceptions by handling the event. [!code-csharp[ApplicationDispatcherUnhandledExceptionSnippets#HandleDispatcherUnhandledExceptionCODEBEHIND1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationDispatcherUnhandledExceptionSnippets/CSharp/App.xaml.cs#handledispatcherunhandledexceptioncodebehind1)] [!code-vb[ApplicationDispatcherUnhandledExceptionSnippets#HandleDispatcherUnhandledExceptionCODEBEHIND1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationDispatcherUnhandledExceptionSnippets/visualbasic/application.xaml.vb#handledispatcherunhandledexceptioncodebehind1)] [!code-csharp[ApplicationDispatcherUnhandledExceptionSnippets#HandleDispatcherUnhandledExceptionCODEBEHIND2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationDispatcherUnhandledExceptionSnippets/CSharp/App.xaml.cs#handledispatcherunhandledexceptioncodebehind2)] [!code-vb[ApplicationDispatcherUnhandledExceptionSnippets#HandleDispatcherUnhandledExceptionCODEBEHIND2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationDispatcherUnhandledExceptionSnippets/visualbasic/application.xaml.vb#handledispatcherunhandledexceptioncodebehind2)]

span.span: Occurs just before an application shuts down, and cannot be canceled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序可以关闭这两个原因如下：An application can shut down for either of the following reasons: - 方法调用对象时，通过显式或确定属性。The method of the object is called, either explicitly or as determined by the property. - 用户通过注销或关闭来结束会话。The user ends the session by logging off or shutting down. 通过处理应用程序关闭时可以检测事件，并执行所需的任何其他处理。You can detect when application shutdown occurs by handling the event, and perform any additional processing as required. 你还可以处理若要检查或更改应用程序退出代码时无需调用显式。You can also handle to inspect or change the application exit code when you don't need to call explicitly. 从其公开的退出代码的属性自变量传递给事件处理程序。The exit code is exposed from the property of the argument that's passed to the event handler. 当应用程序停止运行时，退出代码进行后续处理传递到操作系统。When the application stops running, the exit code is passed to the operating system for subsequent processing. 如果你的应用程序处理事件，并随后取消它，则不会引发和应用程序将继续根据关闭模式运行。If your application handles the event and subsequently cancels it, is not raised and the application continues running in accordance with the shutdown mode. 退出代码可以设置从[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)]，尽管忽略的值。The exit code can be set from an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)], although the value is ignored. 有关[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)]，在以下情况下引发：For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)], is raised in the following circumstances: - [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbap-md.md)]导航离开。An [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbap-md.md)] is navigated away from. - 在中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)]，当托管选项卡[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbap-md.md)]已关闭。In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)], when the tab that is hosting the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbap-md.md)] is closed. - 关闭浏览器时。When the browser is closed. 在所有情况下，值属性将被忽略。In all cases, the value of the property is ignored. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何：The following example demonstrates how to: - 处理事件。Handle the event. - 检查并更新属性的。Inspect and update the property of the . - 向独立存储中的应用程序日志写入条目。Write an entry to an application log in isolated storage. - 应用程序将状态保存到独立存储。Persist the application state to isolated storage. [!code-xaml[ApplicationExitSnippets#HandleExitXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationExitSnippets/CSharp/App.xaml#handleexitxaml)] [!code-csharp[ApplicationExitSnippets#HandleExitCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationExitSnippets/CSharp/App.xaml.cs#handleexitcodebehind)] [!code-vb[ApplicationExitSnippets#HandleExitCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationExitSnippets/visualbasic/application.xaml.vb#handleexitcodebehind)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将首先查找在指定的资源的应用程序范围资源。 will first look in application-scope resources for the specified resource. 通过管理应用程序范围资源，并从公开属性。Application-scope resources are managed by , and are exposed from the property. 如果应用程序范围资源集中找不到指定的资源下来会搜索系统资源。If the specified resource is not found in the set of application-scope resources, then next searches the system resources. 系统资源是由用户定义的命令行程序资源，包括颜色、 字体和 shell 配置。System resources are shell resources defined by the user, and include colors, fonts, and shell configurations. 它们在从， ，和类型分别为静态属性。These are exposed from the , , and types, respectively, as static properties. 若要使用若要获取它们，这些类型还公开资源键属性，可用于传递给; 例如， 。To use to acquire them, these types also expose resource key properties that are designed to be passed to ; for example, . 因为返回一个对象，如果找到资源，必须强制转换为适当的类型返回的值。Because returns an object, you must cast the returned value to the appropriate type if the resource is found. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果找不到键调用此方法，将引发异常。If you call this method for a key that cannot be found, an exception is thrown. 如果没有要处理的异常，导致调用，调用相反;返回`null`引用时请求的资源无法找到，且不会引发异常。If you do not want to handle exceptions that result from calling , call instead; returns a `null` reference when a requested resource cannot be found, and does not throw an exception. 此方法是线程安全，可以从任何线程调用。This method is thread safe and can be called from any thread. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用以便查找资源，并处理如果找不到资源。The following example shows how to use to find a resource, and to handle if the resource is not found. [!code-csharp[ApplicationFindResourceSnippets#ApplicationCallFindResourceCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationFindResourceSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#applicationcallfindresourcecodebehind)] [!code-vb[ApplicationFindResourceSnippets#ApplicationCallFindResourceCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationFindResourceSnippets/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#applicationcallfindresourcecodebehind)]

summary.span: Gets or sets the main window of the application.

span.span: Gets or sets the main window of the application.

value.span: 一个被指定为应用程序主窗口。

span.span: A that is designated as the main application window.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自动设置第一个引用对象中进行实例化。 is automatically set with a reference to the first object to be instantiated in the . 可以通过设置指定不同的主窗口分配另一个对象传递给属性。You can specify a different main window by setting assigning another object to the property. 如果的属性对象设置为，关闭主窗口，则会关闭该应用程序。If the property of the object is set to , closing the main window causes the application to shut down. 可以设置属性从[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]，如果应用程序的主窗口不是通过设置生成的窗口中的属性[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]。It is possible to set the property from [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)], if an application's main window is not the window that is produced by setting the property in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]. 两个限制[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]方法是：The two limitations of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] approach are: - 您可以指定[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]-仅或[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]-仅主窗口。You can specify either a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]-only or a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]-only as the main window. - 必须设置指定窗口的属性，否则将不会显示。You must set the property of the window you specify, otherwise it won't be shown. 对第一个引用要实例化对象同时也添加到的第一项作为集合。The reference to the first object to be instantiated is also added as the first item to the collection. 如果随后将设置为另一种引用，具有主窗口的引用的项的位置会更改，而在中的项的顺序保持不变。If is subsequently set with a reference to a different , the position of the item with the reference to the main window will change, while the order of items in remains the same. 因此，始终使用若要向主窗口而不是中的第一个项，请参阅。Consequently, always use to refer to the main window instead of the first item in . > [!NOTE] > 如果主窗口，并且需要对特定访问权限成员，您将需要的值强制转换到。If the main window is a , and you need specific access to members, you will need to cast the value of to . > > 此属性是只能从创建的线程对象。This property is available only from the thread that created the object. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何查找应用程序主窗口。The following example shows how to find the main application window. [!code-csharp[ApplicationMainWindowSnippets#GetApplicationMainWindowCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationMainWindowSnippets/CSharp/App.xaml.cs#getapplicationmainwindowcode)] [!code-vb[ApplicationMainWindowSnippets#GetApplicationMainWindowCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationMainWindowSnippets/visualbasic/application.xaml.vb#getapplicationmainwindowcode)] 下面的示例演示如何设置使用[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]。The following example shows how to set using [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]. [!code-xaml[ApplicationMainWindowSnippets#SetApplicationMainWindowXAML](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationMainWindowSnippets/XAML/App.xaml#setapplicationmainwindowxaml)] 下面的示例演示如何实例化在代码中应用程序启动过程。The following example shows how to instantiate the in code during application startup. [!code-csharp[HOWTOWindowManagementSnippets#FirstWindowUsingCodeCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HOWTOWindowManagementSnippets/CSharp/App.xaml.cs#firstwindowusingcodecodebehind)] [!code-vb[HOWTOWindowManagementSnippets#FirstWindowUsingCodeCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HOWTOWindowManagementSnippets/visualbasic/application.xaml.vb#firstwindowusingcodecodebehind)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公开一个字典，通过可以用于存储应用程序作用域属性。 exposes a dictionary via which you can use to store application-scope properties. 这使您可以共享状态中的所有代码以线程安全的方式，而无需编写自己的状态代码。This allows you to share state amongst all code in an in a thread-safe fashion, without the need to write your own state code. 属性存储在必须转换为适当的返回类型。Properties stored in must be converted to the appropriate type returned. 属性是线程安全并可从任何线程。The property is thread safe and is available from any thread. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建和使用应用程序作用域属性使用。The following example shows how create and use an application-scope property using . remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]资源是在运行时根据入口程序集，从返回的值标识解析方法。By default, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] resources are resolved at run time with respect to the entry assembly, which is identified by the value returned from the method. 入口程序集是返回的程序集和可能如下所示：The entry assembly is the assembly that is returned by and could be the following: - 默认应用程序域中的可执行程序集。The executable assembly in the default application domain. - 要通过调用执行的第一个程序集。The first assembly to be executed by calling . 在以下情况下，但是，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]程序集不能获取对入口程序集的引用：In the following cases, however, a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] assembly cannot get a reference to the entry assembly: - 非托管 （本机） 应用程序主机[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]程序集。An unmanaged (native) application hosts the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] assembly. - 托管应用程序主机[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]程序集加载到新的应用程序域使用一种方法不通过。A managed application hosts the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] assembly by loading it into a new application domain using a method other than . 在这些情况下，这种将返回`null`，和[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]无法解析程序集的资源。In both of these cases, returns `null`, and the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] assembly's resources cannot be resolved. 在这些情况下，后即可设置，仅限为应该用于解析资源的程序集的引用。In these cases, can be set, once only, with a reference to the assembly that should be used to resolve resources. 只能设置一次由于它是不太可能，则资源程序集将发生更改后[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]则加载程序集。 can only be set once because it is unlikely that the resource assembly will change after the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] assembly is loaded. > [!NOTE] > 时，无法设置[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]程序集可以发现入口程序集 — 也就是说，当返回到程序集的引用而非`null`。 cannot be set when a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] assembly can discover the entry assembly—that is, when returns a reference to an assembly rather than `null`. 此属性是线程安全的可从任何线程。This property is thread safe and is available from any thread. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

summary.span: Gets or sets a collection of application-scope resources, such as styles and brushes.

value.span: 一个对象，其中包含零个或多个应用程序范围资源。

span.span: A object that contains zero or more application-scope resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可用于在 windows 和应用程序元素之间共享资源。The property can be used to share resources across the windows and elements of an application. 此外，属性包含在资源查找路径中，按以下顺序遍历：Additionally, the property is included in the resource lookup path, which is traversed in the following order: 1. 元素Elements 2. WindowsWindows 3. 4. 系统System 因此，[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]元素可以将绑定到应用程序范围资源。Consequently, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elements can bind to application-scope resources. 此外，如果更改了资源，资源系统可确保该元素绑定到这些资源的属性会自动更新以反映更改。Additionally, if resources change, the resource system ensures that element properties which are bound to those resources are automatically updated to reflect the change. 应用程序范围资源提供简单的方法来支持整个应用程序一致的主题。Application-scope resources provide a simple way to support a consistent theme across your application. 您可以轻松地创建中的一个主题[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]通过使用`Application.Resources`标记。You can easily create a theme in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] by using the `Application.Resources` tag. 但是，如果你的应用程序支持多个主题，其中可能包含大量主题元素，可能会更轻松地管理它们使用一个实例为每个主题。However, if your application supports multiple themes, which may contain a large number of theme elements, it might be easier to manage them using one instance for each theme. 这样一来，可以通过将资源属性设置为相应应用新主题。In this way, a new theme can be applied by setting the Resources property to the appropriate . 有两个注意事项，以便使用。There are two considerations to make when using . 首先，字典*密钥*是一个对象，因此您需要使用完全相同的对象实例时设置和获取属性值 （请注意，使用字符串键时区分大小写）。First, the dictionary *key* is an object, so you need to use exactly the same object instance when both setting and getting a property value (note that the key is case-sensitive when using a string). 其次，字典*值*是一个对象，因此将需要获取属性值时，将值转换为所需的类型。Second, the dictionary *value* is an object, so you will need to convert the value to the desired type when getting a property value. 线程是安全且可从任何线程。 is thread safe and is available from any thread. ## Examples 此示例说明了如何使用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]以及要创建一致的可视外观的应用程序范围资源。This example illustrates how to use [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] together with application-scope resources to create a consistent visual appearance. [!code-xaml[ApplicationResourcesSnippets#ResourcesPropertyXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationResourcesSnippets/CS/App.xaml#resourcespropertyxaml)] [!code-xaml[ApplicationResourcesSnippets#WindowBackgroundPropertyXAML1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationResourcesSnippets/CS/MainWindow.xaml#windowbackgroundpropertyxaml1)] [!code-xaml[ApplicationResourcesSnippets#WindowBackgroundPropertyXAML2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationResourcesSnippets/CS/MainWindow.xaml#windowbackgroundpropertyxaml2)] 下面的示例演示如何在代码和 XAML 中设置应用程序资源。The following example shows how to set an application resource in code and XAML. [!code-csharp[HOWTOApplicationModelSnippets#SetApplicationScopeResourceCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HOWTOApplicationModelSnippets/CSharp/ApplicationPropertiesSnippet.xaml.cs#setapplicationscoperesourcecode)] [!code-vb[HOWTOApplicationModelSnippets#SetApplicationScopeResourceCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HOWTOApplicationModelSnippets/visualbasic/applicationpropertiessnippet.xaml.vb#setapplicationscoperesourcecode)] [!code-xaml[HOWTOApplicationModelSnippets#SetApplicationScopeResourceXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HOWTOApplicationModelSnippets/CSharp/App.xaml#setapplicationscoperesourcexaml)] 下面的示例演示如何在代码中获取应用程序资源。The following example shows how to get an application resource in code. [!code-csharp[HOWTOApplicationModelSnippets#GetApplicationScopeResourceCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HOWTOApplicationModelSnippets/CSharp/ApplicationPropertiesSnippet.xaml.cs#getapplicationscoperesourcecode)] [!code-vb[HOWTOApplicationModelSnippets#GetApplicationScopeResourceCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HOWTOApplicationModelSnippets/visualbasic/applicationpropertiessnippet.xaml.vb#getapplicationscoperesourcecode)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用以启动[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]应用程序。 is called to start a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] application. 如果你定义你通过使用标记，或标记和代码隐藏将隐式调用。If you define your using markup, or markup and code-behind, will be called implicitly. 但是，如果你定义你使用的代码，您将需要显式调用。However, if you define your using code, you will need to explicitly call . 当调用时，附加一个新实例与 UI 线程。When is called, attaches a new instance to the UI thread. 下一步，对象的调用方法时，启动消息泵处理 windows 消息。Next, the object's method is called, which starts a message pump to process windows messages. 最后，对象调用对象的方法来引发事件。Finally, the object calls the object's the method to raise the event. 因此，您处理时建立的应用程序执行模型，此时应用程序被视为处于运行状态。Consequently, the application execution model has been established by the time you handle , at which point the application is considered to be running. 应用程序停止运行时称为; 的值属性确定何时被调用，并且它会自动发生还是需要显式调用它。An application stops running when is called; the value of the property determines when is called, and whether it happens automatically or you need to explicitly call it. 可以仅从创建的线程调用对象。 can be called only from the thread that creates the object. 此外，不能从调用[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbap-md.md)]。Also, cannot be called from a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbap-md.md)]. ## Examples 下面的示例演示使用自定义的应用程序，因此必须显式调用。The following example shows an application that uses a custom and must therefore explicitly call . summary.span: Occurs when the user ends the Windows session by logging off or shutting down the operating system.

span.span: Occurs when the user ends the Windows session by logging off or shutting down the operating system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，在关闭应用程序在 Windows 会话结束，当用户注销或关闭时发生。By default, an application shuts down when the Windows session ends, which occurs when a user logs off or shuts down. 在此情况下，Windows 会询问要关闭的情况下每个打开的应用程序。When this happens, Windows asks each open application to shut down. 但是，有可能，应用程序可能不是准备好关闭时出现这种情况。However, it is possible that an application may not be ready to shut down when this occurs. 例如，应用程序可能处于不一致状态，或一个长时间运行的操作的中间数据。For example, an application may have data that is in an inconsistent state, or in the middle of a long-running operation. 在这些情况下，它可能需要阻止会话结束，并可能更希望允许用户决定允许会话结束的选项。In these situations, it may be desirable to prevent the session from ending, and may be more desirable to allow users the option to decide whether or not to let the session to end. 通过处理在会话结束时可以检测事件。You can detect when a session ends by handling the event. 如果应用程序需要以阻止在会话结束，传递给事件处理程序自变量公开设置为`true`(默认值是`false`)。If an application needs to prevent the session from ending, the argument that is passed to the event handler exposes the that you set to `true` (the default value is `false`). 如果未经处理，或处理无正在取消称为和引发事件。If is unhandled, or is handled without being cancelled, is called and the event is raised. 若要获取有关会话正在结束的原因的详细信息，应用程序可以检查，这是之一值 (和)。To obtain more information about why the session is ending, an application can inspect , which is one of the values ( and ). 不会引发由控制台应用程序。 is not raised by console applications. 仅在创建的线程上引发对象。 is raised only on the thread that creates the object. 不会引发 XAML 浏览器应用程序 (Xbap)。 is not raised for XAML browser applications (XBAPs). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何处理事件，并允许用户取消它。The following example demonstrates how to handle the event and allow the user to cancel it. [!code-xaml[ApplicationSessionEndingSnippets#HandlingSessionEndingXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationSessionEndingSnippets/CSharp/App.xaml#handlingsessionendingxaml)] [!code-csharp[ApplicationSessionEndingSnippets#HandlingSessionEndingCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationSessionEndingSnippets/CSharp/App.xaml.cs#handlingsessionendingcodebehind)] [!code-vb[ApplicationSessionEndingSnippets#HandlingSessionEndingCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationSessionEndingSnippets/visualbasic/application.xaml.vb#handlingsessionendingcodebehind)]

span.span: Creates a cookie for the location specified by a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Cookie 是任意段可由客户端计算机上应用程序应用程序的会话 (会话 cookie) 期间或在不同的应用程序会话 (持久性 cookie) 存储的数据。A cookie is an arbitrary piece of data that can be stored by an application on the client machine during application sessions (session cookies) or across application sessions (persistent cookies). 您可以通过调用创建这两种类型的 cookie 。You can create both types of cookies by calling . Cookie 数据通常需要以名称/值对的形式，采用以下格式：Cookie data typically takes the form of a name/value pair in the following format: `Name=Value` 传递到该格式的字符串，连同应为其设置 cookie 的位置 （通常情况下，应用程序域）。You pass a string of this format to , along with the of the location for which the cookie should be set (typically, the application domain). Cookie 是会话 cookie 还是持久性 cookie 取决于是否 cookie 字符串传递给包括到期日期。Whether a cookie is a session cookie or a persistent cookie depends on whether the cookie string that you pass to includes an expiry date. 会话 cookie 的字符串不包括到期日期。The string for a session cookie does not include an expiry date. 持久性 cookie 的字符串匹配，并且必须采用以下格式：The string for a persistent cookie does, and must be in the following format: `NAME=VALUE; expires=DAY, DD-MMM-YYYY HH:MM:SS GMT` 永久 cookie 存储在当前[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)]在到期，在这种情况下删除它们之前安装的 Temporary Internet Files 文件夹。Persistent cookies are stored in the current [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] installation's Temporary Internet Files folder until they expire, in which case they are deleted. 通过设置其到期日期为过去的日期/时间值，可以从你的应用程序删除持久性 cookie。You can delete a persistent cookie from your application by setting its expiry date to a date/time value that is in the past. 有关概述中的 cookie [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]，请参阅[导航概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/navigation-overview.md)。For an overview of cookies in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)], see [Navigation Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/navigation-overview.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当调用时，应用程序停止运行。When is called, an application stops running. 您可以处理事件来检测应用程序时要停止运行，若要执行任何适当的处理。You can handle the event to detect when an application is about to stop running, to perform any appropriate processing. 在以下情况下隐式调用由 Windows Presentation Foundation: is implicitly called by Windows Presentation Foundation in the following situations: - 当设置为。When is set to . - 当设置为。When the is set to . - 当用户结束会话和未经处理的或在不取消的情况下处理事件。When a user ends a session and the event is either unhandled, or handled without cancellation. 调用显式导致关闭的情况下，应用程序而不考虑设置。Calling explicitly causes an application to shut down, regardless of the setting. 但是，如果设置为，则必须调用关闭应用程序。However, if is set to , you must call to shut down an application. > [!IMPORTANT] > 当是调用，该应用程序将关闭而不考虑是否取消事件的任何打开的窗口。When is called, the application will shut down irrespective of whether the event of any open windows is canceled. 可以仅从创建的线程调用此方法对象。This method can be called only from the thread that created the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序停止运行时，才调用的应用程序的方法。Applications stop running only when the method of the Application is called. 关闭可以进行隐式或显式指定的值的属性。Shut down can occur implicitly or explicitly, as specified by the value of the property. 如果您设置到，Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 隐式调用应用程序中的最后一个窗口关闭时，即使任何当前实例化的窗口设置为在主窗口 (请参阅)。If you set to , Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) implicitly calls when the last window in an application closes, even if any currently instantiated windows are set as the main window (see ). 一个的使 WPF 在隐式调用时将关闭，即使当前打开了其他窗口。A of causes WPF to implicitly call when the closes, even if other windows are currently open. 某些应用程序的生存期可能不是依赖于当主窗口或最后一个窗口已关闭，或可能根本不依赖于 windows。The lifetime of some applications may not be dependent on when the main window or last window is closed, or may not be dependent on windows at all. 对于这些方案需要设置属性设置为，这需要显式方法调用来停止该应用程序。For these scenarios you need to set the property to , which requires an explicit method call to stop the application. 否则，应用程序将继续在后台运行。Otherwise, the application continues running in the background. 以声明方式，可以通过配置[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]或以编程方式从代码。 can be configured declaratively from [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] or programmatically from code. 此属性是只能从创建的线程对象。This property is available only from the thread that created the object. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何配置指定必须显式关闭应用程序。The following example shows how to configure to specify that an application must be closed explicitly. [!code-xaml[ApplicationShutdownModeSnippets#SetShutdownModeXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationShutdownModeSnippets/CS/App.xaml#setshutdownmodexaml)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 典型的 Windows Presentation Foundation 应用程序可能执行的各种初始化任务，在启动时，包括：A typical Windows Presentation Foundation application may perform a variety of initialization tasks when it starts up, including: - 处理命令行参数。Processing command-line parameters. - 打开主窗口。Opening the main window. - 正在初始化应用程序范围资源。Initializing application-scope resources. - 正在初始化应用程序范围的属性。Initializing application-scope properties. 你可以以声明方式指定的主窗口和使用的应用程序范围资源[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)](和分别)。You can declaratively specify the main window and application-scope resources using [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] ( and , respectively). 有时，但是，你的应用程序的主窗口或资源可以仅是以编程方式在运行时确定。Sometimes, however, the resources or main window of your application can only be determined programmatically at run time. 此外，应用程序作用域属性和命令行参数只能以编程方式。Additionally, application-scope properties and command-line parameters can only be used programmatically. 可以通过处理执行以编程方式初始化事件，其中包括：Programmatic initialization can be performed by handling the event, including the following: - 获取和处理命令行参数，可从的属性类，该类传递到事件处理程序。Acquire and process command-line parameters, which are available from the property of the class that is passed to the event handler. - 使用初始化应用程序范围资源属性。Initialize application-scope resources by using the property. - 使用初始化应用程序作用域属性属性。Initialize application-scope properties by using the property. - 实例化并显示一个 （或多个） 窗口。Instantiate and show one (or more) windows. > [!NOTE] > 命令行参数还可以获取通过调用静态方法的对象。Command-line parameters can also be acquired by calling the static method of the object. 但是，需要完全信任才能执行。However, requires full trust to execute. 如果您设置使用[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]，创建主窗口中不可用或者属性或属性后的对象，直到处理事件。If you set using [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)], the main window that is created is not available from either the property or the property of the object until after the event is processed. 如果在启动期间需要访问主窗口，您需要手动创建新的窗口对象从你事件处理程序。If you need access to the main window during startup, you need to manually create a new window object from your event handler. > [!NOTE] > 如果应用程序使用若要指定凭据策略，您需要设置后引发; 否则为[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]将其设置为默认内部策略直接后引发事件。If your application uses to specify a credential policy, you need to set after is raised; otherwise, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] sets it to a default internal policy directly after the event has been raised. 传递给命令行参数事件处理程序将不与相同[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_url](~/includes/tlasharptla-url-md.md)]查询字符串参数传递给[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)]。The command-line arguments that are passed to the event handler are not the same as the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_url](~/includes/tlasharptla-url-md.md)] query string parameters that are passed to an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)]. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何获取和处理从独立的应用程序的命令行选项。The following example shows how to acquire and process command-line options from a standalone application. 如果 **/StartMinimized**提供命令行参数，在打开应用程序主窗口最小化状态。If the **/StartMinimized** command-line parameter was provided, the application opens the main window in a minimized state. [!code-xaml[ApplicationStartupSnippets#HandleStartupXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationStartupSnippets/CSharp/App.xaml#handlestartupxaml)] [!code-csharp[ApplicationStartupSnippets#HandleStartupCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationStartupSnippets/CSharp/App.xaml.cs#handlestartupcodebehind)] [!code-vb[ApplicationStartupSnippets#HandleStartupCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationStartupSnippets/visualbasic/application.xaml.vb#handlestartupcodebehind)] [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)] 无法检索和处理命令行参数，因为它们与启动[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clickonce](~/includes/tlasharptla-clickonce-md.md)]部署 (请参阅[部署 WPF 应用程序 (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/deploying-a-wpf-application-wpf.md))。 cannot retrieve and process command-line arguments because they are launched with [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clickonce](~/includes/tlasharptla-clickonce-md.md)] deployment (see [Deploying a WPF Application (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/deploying-a-wpf-application-wpf.md)). 但是，它们可以检索和处理来自用于启动它们的 URL 的查询字符串参数。However, they can retrieve and process query string parameters from the URLs that are used to launch them.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用应用程序启动时自动加载 UI 资源。You can use to automatically load a UI resource when an application starts. 下表显示可以加载 UI 资源的类型、，到打开的窗口类型和可以为设置这些资源的应用程序的类型。The following table shows the types of UI resources that can be loaded, the type of window they are opened into, and the type of application that these resources can be set as the . |类型Type|窗口Window|应用程序类型Application type| |----------|------------|----------------------| |||仅独立应用程序Standalone only| |||仅独立应用程序Standalone only| |||独立/浏览器托管Standalone/browser-hosted| |||独立/浏览器托管Standalone/browser-hosted| |||独立/浏览器托管Standalone/browser-hosted| |||独立/浏览器托管Standalone/browser-hosted| 通常情况下，设置属性中以声明方式[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]。Typically, you set the property declaratively in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]. 但是，可以设置以编程方式，如从事件处理程序，如果对于仅在运行时加载所需的 UI 资源的应用程序很有用。However, you can set programmatically, such as from a event handler, which is useful if for applications that can only load the necessary UI resources at run time. 例如，应用程序可能会等到运行时，如果 UI 资源的名称存储在配置文件加载其资源。For example, an application might wait until run time to load its resources if the name of the UI resource is stored in a configuration file. 您将设置以声明方式或以编程方式，直到未加载相应的用户界面资源后处理事件。Whether you set declaratively or programmatically, the corresponding UI resource is not loaded until after the event is handled. 因此，您不会有权访问生成的窗口眖属性或属性时处理。Consequently, you won't have access to the resulting window from either the property or the property when handling .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将首先查找在指定的资源的应用程序范围资源。 will first look in application-scope resources for the specified resource. 通过管理应用程序范围资源，并从公开属性。Application-scope resources are managed by , and are exposed from the property. 如果应用程序范围资源集中找不到指定的资源下来会搜索系统资源。If the specified resource is not found in the set of application-scope resources, then next searches the system resources. 系统资源是由用户定义的命令行程序资源，包括颜色、 字体和 shell 配置。System resources are shell resources defined by the user, and include colors, fonts, and shell configurations. 它们在从， ，和类型分别为静态属性。These are exposed from the , , and types, respectively, as static properties. 若要使用若要获取它们，这些类型还公开资源键属性，可用于传递给; 例如， 。To use to acquire them, these types also expose resource key properties that are designed to be passed to ; for example, . 因为返回一个对象，如果找到资源，必须强制转换为适当的类型返回的值。Because returns an object, you must cast the returned value to the appropriate type if the resource is found. 此方法是线程安全，可以从任何线程调用。This method is thread safe and can be called from any thread. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用获取资源。The following example shows how to use to acquire a resource. [!code-xaml[ApplicationTryFindResourceSnippets#ApplicationCallTryFindResourceXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationTryFindResourceSnippets/CSharp/App.xaml#applicationcalltryfindresourcexaml)] [!code-csharp[ApplicationTryFindResourceSnippets#ApplicationCallTryFindResourceCODEBEHIND1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationTryFindResourceSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#applicationcalltryfindresourcecodebehind1)] [!code-vb[ApplicationTryFindResourceSnippets#ApplicationCallTryFindResourceCODEBEHIND1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationTryFindResourceSnippets/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#applicationcalltryfindresourcecodebehind1)] [!code-csharp[ApplicationTryFindResourceSnippets#ApplicationCallTryFindResourceCODEBEHIND2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationTryFindResourceSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#applicationcalltryfindresourcecodebehind2)] [!code-vb[ApplicationTryFindResourceSnippets#ApplicationCallTryFindResourceCODEBEHIND2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationTryFindResourceSnippets/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#applicationcalltryfindresourcecodebehind2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个引用自动添加到上实例化窗口时，就立即[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]线程; 创建的线程不会添加辅助角色的 windows。A reference is automatically added to as soon as a window is instantiated on the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] thread; windows that are created by worker threads are not added. 一个后自动删除引用其处理事件之前其引发事件。A reference is automatically removed after its event has been handled and before its event is raised. 默认情况下，第一项添加到属性会变得。By default, the first item added to the property becomes the . 此属性是只能从创建的线程对象。This property is available only from the thread that created the object. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了如何枚举属性生成一个顶级的 Windows 菜单，其中共有[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mdi](~/includes/tlasharptla-mdi-md.md)]应用程序如[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xl](~/includes/tlasharptla-xl-md.md)]，或多个实例单文档界面 (SDI) 应用程序，如[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_word](~/includes/tlasharptla-word-md.md)].The following example demonstrates how to enumerate the property to build a top-level Windows menu, which is common to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mdi](~/includes/tlasharptla-mdi-md.md)] applications like [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xl](~/includes/tlasharptla-xl-md.md)], or multiple-instance Single Document Interface (SDI) applications like [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_word](~/includes/tlasharptla-word-md.md)]. [!code-csharp[ApplicationWindowsSnippets#WindowMenuItemCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationWindowsSnippets/CSharp/WindowMenuItem.cs#windowmenuitemcode)] [!code-vb[ApplicationWindowsSnippets#WindowMenuItemCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationWindowsSnippets/visualbasic/windowmenuitem.vb#windowmenuitemcode)] [!code-xaml[ApplicationWindowsSnippets#MainWindowSetWindowsXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationWindowsSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml#mainwindowsetwindowsxaml)] [!code-csharp[ApplicationWindowsSnippets#MainWindowSetWindowsCODEBEHIND1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationWindowsSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#mainwindowsetwindowscodebehind1)] [!code-vb[ApplicationWindowsSnippets#MainWindowSetWindowsCODEBEHIND1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationWindowsSnippets/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#mainwindowsetwindowscodebehind1)] [!code-csharp[ApplicationWindowsSnippets#MainWindowSetWindowsCODEBEHIND2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationWindowsSnippets/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#mainwindowsetwindowscodebehind2)] [!code-vb[ApplicationWindowsSnippets#MainWindowSetWindowsCODEBEHIND2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ApplicationWindowsSnippets/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#mainwindowsetwindowscodebehind2)]
